author: Cedric Canard
content: That's a crazy, spooky shot Andreas. I did see the new PoTA movie (I've also seen the originals) and I did like it. It's not a classic or anything but I did like the premise and the whole thing seemed realistic (as long as you don't look for loop holes too hard). In other words, I found it to be good entertainment. I will see the sequel some time.
